title: White supremacy is just the tip of the racism iceberg
description: W. Kamau Bell explains why white supremacists and neo-Nazi groups are only scratching the surface of systemic racism. Watch United Shades of America every Sunday at 10pm ET.

title: Trump administration to review DACA and reject new applications
description: The Trump administration will not accept new applications for the Obama-era program that shields from deportation certain undocumented immigrants who came to the US as children and will limit renewals to one year instead of two while it reviews the program, a senior administration official told reporters Tuesday.

title: Trump makes false claims about his swing state polling
description:
• Analysis: The pandemic is drowning out the election it may decide
• Opinion: Biden could still lose this election
• What Trump said after Fauci threw MLB season's first pitch

title: Brad Pitt scores Emmy nomination for playing Dr. Fauci on 'SNL'
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci's "SNL" dream has become Brad Pitt's nomination reality.

title: Endangered tigers captured on camera bolster hope for species' survival
description: Conservationists have captured footage of endangered tigers in a region of western Thailand for the first time in four years.

title: Virgin Galactic gives first look inside its space tourism plane
description: When Virgin Galactic's tourism customers take their quarter-million dollar ride to the edge of space, they'll strap themselves into custom-made reclining seats and blast into the upper atmosphere before spending a few minutes floating in microgravity — all while an on-board camera system captures their next social media posts.

title: Anger, leaks and tensions at the US Supreme Court during a landmark LGBTQ rights case
description: When the Supreme Court extended the 1964 Civil Rights Act to gay and lesbian workers in a landmark June ruling, the justices also protected transgender employees.

title: Killer whale who grieved for 17 days carrying her dead calf is pregnant again
description: Two years ago, the world watched with a heavy heart as a mother orca carried along her dead new-born for more than two weeks. Now, that same orca is pregnant again.

title: Trump makes false claims about his swing state polling
Pandemic diplomacy: UN envoys lament the death of kisses and cocktail parties
description: Nothing says diplomacy more than a hearty handshake. Touching, embraces, and cheek-to-cheek kisses represented daily life in the corridors and at receptions in the world arena of diplomacy: the United Nations in New York.

title: 'Papillon' the serial runaway bear is on the loose again
description: A brown bear nicknamed "Papillon" after displaying an impressive talent for escaping is being sought by rangers in Italy after fleeing from his electrified pen.

title: 'Unprecedented' Hajj begins
description: Islam's most important annual pilgrimage began Tuesday with just a small fraction of its regular number of worshippers, amid concerns over the coronavirus.

title: Fresh Covid-19 outbreaks sweep across Europe
Postcard reveals place where Van Gogh likely painted his last masterpiece
description: Experts have identified that a vintage postcard depicting a nature scene near where Van Gogh spent the last days of his life may be where the artist painted his final work.

title: 1,000-year-old medieval remedy could be potential antibiotic, scientists say
description: A medieval remedy concocted from onion, garlic, wine and bile salts and detailed in a 1,000-year-old text could help in the fight against infections that resist treatment with antibiotics, UK researchers have found.

title: 'He was slaughtered like a goat': A community under attack during Covid crisis
description: Daniel Bala was walking home from church early on Friday evening. He had just attended choir practice and was looking forward to getting home to his wife and newborn baby who was just two days old.

title: Just when it seemed Europe was getting to grips with the pandemic, Covid-19 appears to be spreading again
description: Just when it seemed that Europe was getting to grips with the coronavirus pandemic, Covid-19 appears to be spreading again.

title: Fauci responds to Trump: I have not misled the public
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci responds to a retweet from President Trump claiming that Dr. Fauci misled the American public in regards to the coronavirus pandemic.

title: 100 million-year-old sea microbes are alive and thriving, study finds
description: Humans can go without food for about three weeks before the effects of starvation begin to kill them.

title: Twitter temporarily limits Donald Trump Jr.'s account
description: • Social media giants remove viral video with false claims that Trump retweeted

title: Trump administration plans to keep federal presence in Portland into October, email shows
description: The Trump administration is planning to keep federal agents in Portland, Oregon, through at least mid-October, according to an internal email obtained by CNN.

title: Melania Trump's brilliant Rose Garden idea
description: To: Melania Trump

title: Twitter temporarily limits Donald Trump Jr.'s account
Schoolgirls discover asteroid moving towards Earth
description: Two Indian schoolgirls have discovered an asteroid which is slowly shifting its orbit and moving towards Earth.

title: Parents organize private proms during pandemic
description: HLN's Lynn Smith reports that some parents are organizing private proms for their teens after cancellations due to the coronavirus pandemic.

title: India is blocking more apps in the wake of the TikTok ban
description: India is banning dozens more apps and reportedly reviewing hundreds of others from well-known Chinese companies, as tensions between the world's most populous countries continue to rise.

title: The video of my daughter's murder is still on YouTube and Facebook
description: My daughter Alison was murdered on live television on August 26, 2015.  To this day, the video of her murder is still being hosted on YouTube and Facebook.

title: Senate Republicans have grown extremely frustrated with the White House on stimulus negotiations
description: Democrats have a proposal on the table. Republicans have a proposal on the table. The two sides are roughly $2.5 trillion apart on the topline, facing gulfs epic in scale on the granular policy level and have all of four days to reach a deal before federal unemployment benefits expire.

title: This Republican Senator accidentally told an appalling truth
description: Sen. Tom Cotton of Arkansas probably thought he was being clever when he accidentally said the quiet part aloud to the Arkansas Democrat-Gazette for an article that ran Sunday -- he said that slavery was a necessary evil to ensure the creation of the United States of America.

title: Trump shatters his own show of responsibility
description:
• Here's what's in the $1tn stimulus bill
• Analysis: Trump's message collides with diversifying suburbs
• Trump moves forward with his plan to regulate social media

title: X-15: The fastest manned rocket plane ever
description: More than 60 years after its first flight, the X-15 is still the fastest manned aircraft of all time.

title: Paradise lost: Eviction looms for hermit living alone on Italian island
description: For even more videos from this part of the world head to Great Big Story.

title: Dr. Fauci threw season's first baseball pitch. Then Trump said this
description: President Donald Trump postponed his plan to throw the opening pitch at a New York Yankees game after saying he'd received an invite to do so. The New York Times reported that both announcements took the baseball team by surprise.

title: NASA's X-15 is still the world's fastest manned aircraft
description: Rocketing at close to seven times the speed of sound and climbing as high as the edge of space, the X-15 first flew over 60 years ago but remains the fastest manned aircraft ever made.

title: Endangered 'scrotum frog' could be on its last legs. Scientists hope to change that
description: A group of international scientists are joining forces to save an unusual endangered species -- the so-called "scrotum frog."

title: Tennis star details debilitating side-effects of catching Covid-19
description: Tennis star Grigor Dimitrov says he's unsure of competing at the US Open as he detailed the debilitating side-effects of catching Covid-19.

title: Countries that got the virus under control are struggling. That's deeply concerning for the rest of the world.
description: The coronavirus is "easily the most severe" public health emergency the World Health Organization (WHO) has ever faced, its director-general said Monday, as countries that previously appeared to have the pandemic under control recorded an uptick in cases.

title: They asked the consul for help and say they were assaulted and exploited in return
Her great-grandmother fought Nazis. She confronted people who wore swastika masks
description: When Raphaela Mueller saw a couple wearing swastika masks in a Minnesota Walmart, she knew she had to say something.

title: Chinese students in Australia are being scammed into faking their own kidnapping
description: Chinese students in Australia are being coerced by criminal gangs to fake their own kidnappings as part of an elaborate global extortion racket targeting vulnerable overseas communities, authorities said Monday.

title: Kim says there will be 'no more war on this earth' thanks to North Korea's nukes
description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said he believes his country will no longer need to fight wars because its nuclear arsenal guarantees its safety, according to North Korean state media.

title: Former Malaysian Prime Minister found guilty on seven charges related to 1MDB scandal
description: Disgraced former Malaysian Prime Minister Najib Razak has been found guilty on seven charges related to the 1MDB scandal, which saw billions of dollars of taxpayers money funneled and embezzled out of Malaysia.

title: Former NFL player convicted of rape
description: A former NFL player for the San Francisco 49ers was convicted of rape and other charges in a California courtroom Monday.

title: Anderson Cooper calls out Trump for golfing while virus surges
description: CNN's Anderson Cooper calls out President Trump for failing to lead on the coronavirus pandemic.
